title: Not the 9 O'clock News: Gorilla kinda lingers
brief_description: Excerpts from the best of “Not the 9 O’clock News”, the groundbreaking British comedy series which took the mickey out of all that was, and still is, sacred and dear to the British public in the mid-1980s. 129 hard-hitting satirical barbs in 99-minutes of side-splitting humour.
